_header: Jesu to His disciples said / As it is here in scripture laid
_description: Gospel for Tuesday after Whit Sunday, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Ihesu to his disciples seideAs hit is here in scripture
                    leide…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þat liueþ and Regneþ bi his graceEuer more in
                    heuene place. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.

                poet.a.1,
